statements: SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT stock_id, high_price, low_price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_id, high_price, low_price, volume FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price < 50 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT stock_id, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1
SELECT date, open_price, high_price, low_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 1000000
SELECT stock_id, MAX(close_price) AS max_close, MIN(close_price) AS min_close FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_id
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(close_price) AS avg_close FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id IN (2, 3, 4)
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > 100;
SELECT analysis_date, stock_symbol, analysis_result FROM stock_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(high_price) AS highest_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(open_price) AS average_open_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE open_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC, date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date DESC, open_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM stock_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, high_price, low_price FROM stock_prices WHERE high_price - low_price >= 10 ORDER BY high_price DESC, low_price ASC LIMIT 15;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY open_price DESC, close_price ASC LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY price_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, opening_price FROM stock_prices WHERE closing_price > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol FROM stock_prices;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT max(closing_price), min(opening_price) FROM stock_prices;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM stock_prices
SELECT symbol_name, stock_id FROM stock_symbols ORDER BY symbol_name
SELECT stock_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM historical_data GROUP BY stock_id
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT symbol_name, price FROM stock_symbols JOIN historical_data ON stock_symbols.stock_id = historical_data.stock_id WHERE date = '2022-02-15'
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM stock_data WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY closing_price DESC
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM stock_exchange ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT industry_name, sector FROM stock_industry WHERE sector = 'Technology'
SELECT stock_symbol, company_name, exchange, industry FROM stock_metadata
SELECT stock_symbol, date, closing_price, volume FROM stock_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT company_name, stock_symbol, industry FROM stock_metadata WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC
SELECT * FROM stock_exchange WHERE location = 'New York' AND exchange_name = 'NYSE'

SELECT sd.stock_symbol, sd.date, sd.closing_price, sm.company_name FROM stock_data sd INNER JOIN stock_metadata sm ON sd.stock_symbol = sm.stock_symbol WHERE sd.date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT si.industry_name, si.sector, count(*) AS total_stocks FROM stock_industry si INNER JOIN stock_metadata sm ON si.industry_id = sm.industry GROUP BY si.industry_name, si.sector HAVING count(*) > 5
SELECT symbol, date, close FROM StockPrices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM Stocks WHERE sector = 'Technology';
SELECT symbol, rating, analyst_name FROM AnalystRatings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT symbol, earnings_per_share FROM EarningsReports WHERE earnings_per_share > 1.0 ORDER BY earnings_per_share DESC;
SELECT symbol, ex_dividend_date, dividend_amount FROM DividendHistory ORDER BY ex_dividend_date ASC;
SELECT symbol, date, open, close FROM StockPrices WHERE close > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, company_name, sector FROM Stocks WHERE sector = 'Technology';
SELECT id, symbol, target_price, analyst_name FROM AnalystRatings WHERE rating = 'Buy' ORDER BY target_price DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, report_date, earnings_per_share, revenue FROM EarningsReports WHERE earnings_per_share > 1 AND revenue > 100 ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, symbol, ex_dividend_date, dividend_amount FROM DividendHistory WHERE ex_dividend_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ex_dividend_date ASC LIMIT 5;
